00018 template <class Layer, class View = IShapeView>
00019 class TLayerBase: public Layer
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef Layer BaseClass;
00023 
00024        using BaseClass::GetBoundingBox;
00025 
00026 
00027        TLayerBase();
00028        virtual ~TLayerBase();
00029 
00030        View* GetTViewPtr() const;
00031 
00032        // reimplemented (iview::ILayer)
00033        virtual void OnConnectView(IShapeView* viewPtr);
00034        virtual void OnDisconnectView(IShapeView* viewPtr);
00035        virtual IShapeView* GetViewPtr() const;
00036        virtual bool IsVisible() const;
00037        virtual void SetVisible(bool state = true);
00038 
00039        // reimplemented (iview::IDisplay)
00040        virtual IDisplay* GetParentDisplayPtr() const;
00041        virtual const iview::CScreenTransform& GetTransform() const;
00042        virtual i2d::CRect GetClientRect() const;
00043     virtual const IColorShema& GetColorShema() const;
00044        virtual void OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& prevArea, const i2d::CRect& newArea);
00045 
00046 private:
00047        View* m_viewPtr;
00048        bool m_isVisible;
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 template <class Layer, class View>
00053 inline bool TLayerBase<Layer, View>::IsVisible() const
00054 {
00055        return m_isVisible;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 template <class Layer, class View>
00060 inline void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::SetVisible(bool state)
00061 {
00062        if (m_isVisible != state){
00063               m_isVisible = state;
00064 
00065               if (m_isVisible){
00066                      // Show.
00067                      OnAreaInvalidated(i2d::CRect::GetEmpty(), GetBoundingBox());
00068               }
00069               else{
00070                      // Hide.
00071                      OnAreaInvalidated(GetBoundingBox(), i2d::CRect::GetEmpty());
00072               }
00073        }
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 // public methods
00078 
00079 template <class Layer, class View>
00080 TLayerBase<Layer, View>::TLayerBase()
00081 {
00082        m_viewPtr = NULL;
00083        m_isVisible = true;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 template <class Layer, class View>
00088 TLayerBase<Layer, View>::~TLayerBase()
00089 {
00090        if (m_viewPtr != NULL){
00091               int layerIndex = m_viewPtr->GetLayerIndex(*this);
00092               I_ASSERT(layerIndex >= 0);
00093 
00094               m_viewPtr->RemoveLayer(layerIndex);
00095        }
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 template <class Layer, class View>
00100 View* TLayerBase<Layer, View>::GetTViewPtr() const
00101 {
00102        I_ASSERT(m_viewPtr != NULL);
00103 
00104        return m_viewPtr;
00105 }
00106

00108 // reimplemented (iview::ILayer)
00109 
00110 template <class Layer, class View>
00111 void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::OnConnectView(IShapeView* viewPtr)
00112 {
00113        I_ASSERT(m_viewPtr == NULL);
00114        I_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00115 
00116        m_viewPtr = viewPtr;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 template <class Layer, class View>
00121 void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::OnDisconnectView(IShapeView* I_IF_DEBUG(viewPtr))
00122 {
00123        I_ASSERT(m_viewPtr == viewPtr);
00124        I_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00125 
00126        m_viewPtr = NULL;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 template <class Layer, class View>
00131 IShapeView* TLayerBase<Layer, View>::GetViewPtr() const
00132 {
00133        return GetTViewPtr();
00134 }

00172 
00173 template <class Layer, class View>
00174 void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& prevArea, const i2d::CRect& newArea)
00175 {
00176        I_ASSERT(this->GetBoundingBox().IsInside(newArea));
00177 
00178        if (m_viewPtr != NULL){
00179               m_viewPtr->OnLayerInvalidated(*this, prevArea, newArea);
00180        }
00181 }
